title: Minors
content: Is it possible to do a combination of the minor  streams for example I take a paper each from Business ManagementÂ  and Economics or do I have to stick with any one. Also if there is no last sem ( even) in that case will we need to complete that earlier in the preceding even sem? What is a scoring combination for these credits? Are the classes for these subjects compulsory, asking as we may have other engagements also?

comments.body: Please elaborate on your title guys
Is minors there for ec campus?
